subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Granting autonomy to the five richest conferences would contradict the stated mission of the N.C.A.A., which is to govern college sports in a fair manner.
snippet: Granting autonomy to the five richest conferences would contradict the stated mission of the N.C.A.A., which is to govern college sports in a fair manner.
